item.title: Steel companies want Trump’s tariffs. Here’s why their stocks aren’t jumping.
item.description: Trump’s tariffs on Mexico and Canada are giving a boost to some steelmakers’ stocks, but retaliatory tariffs could reduce the potential benefits.

item.title: Nvidia’s stock falls as these two questions dog investors
item.description: Wall Street is trying to assess how tariffs would impact the chip sector. Plus, the DeepSeek fallout lingers.

item.title: Feeling left behind in a growing economy, middle-income people are cutting back
item.description: Middle-income Americans, feeling pressured and facing the impact of new tariffs, are budgeting less for nonessential costs
